trophies.title: Siren Song
trophies.description: Rescue pirate hostages by distracting enemies with "dancers."

trophies.title: Wild West Indies
trophies.description: Kill 4 enemies in a row using multi-pistols.

trophies.title: Personal Bag Of Tricks
trophies.description: Finish a game session with an ability set that you customized in Multiplayer.

trophies.title: Master Of The Caribbean
trophies.description: Complete the Discovery Mode of Wolfpack in Multiplayer.

trophies.title: Lab Technician
trophies.description: Play and complete a game session of Game Lab in the Multiplayer Public playlist.

trophies.title: All Rounder
trophies.description: Play on every game mode, and use every ability and ranged weapon once in Multiplayer.

trophies.title: Sacred Land
trophies.description: Playing as The Jaguar, be the highest scoring player of a Domination game session.

trophies.title: Queen Anne’s Revenge
trophies.description: Playing as Blackbeard, perform an acrobatic kill and a gun kill in less than 10 seconds.

trophies.title: Preemptive Strike
trophies.description: Playing as The Orchid, block 10 abilities from opponents with Sabotage.

trophies.title: Elevator to the Gallows
trophies.description: Kill a player using a lift that has been trapped with Booby Trap.

trophies.title: Firepower
trophies.description: Kill 5 guards at once with a blunderbuss.

trophies.title: His Own Medicine
trophies.description: Disarm the Gouverneur and kill him with the branding iron.
